additionalValues: Aye Cap'n this will go well in the stable.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} III- Into the Meat and Potatoes
Aye Cap'n this will go well in the stable.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Time is of the essence.
<Stats.Company.[TBW_FailCount]> Good news Commander {Commander.LastName}, the MIM have made significant discoveries to enable us to better define our next move. Sending you the mission parameters.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Bring your Guns to Town
Commander {Commander.LastName}, JumpShip emergance detected and a DropShip is in-bound. Estimate 4 days to Planet Fall.
We have re-evaluated the FOB output and will have enough units to assult the compound within those four days. Re-Up as much as possible and sorry for the short notice Commander {Commander.LastName}.
Commander {Commander.LastName}, JumpShip emergance detected and a DropShip is in-bound. Estimate 4 days to Planet Fall.
Last chance Commander... Fail this one and we will thank you for your service and have to find another Mercenary Company to sort this mess out.
<Stats.Company.[TB_FailCount]> Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - we are going to have to let you go
Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - we are going to have to let you go
Amazing work Commander {Commander.LastName}, I would not have believed it - if not for seeing it first hand.
<Stats.Company.[TBW_FailCount]> - Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - This is less that the stirling performance we were looking for.
<Stats.Company.[TBW_FailCount]> Amazing work Commander {Commander.LastName}, I would not have believed it - if not for seeing it first hand.
